function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of water quality management strategy for building water systems","Impact":"Higher risk of waterborne diseases and illness","Mitigation":"Developing a water quality management strategy including testing, disinfecting, and maintaining building water systems","Technologies":"Water quality testing equipment, disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Facility managers, building management"}]}
